Uses of Class
it.sauronsoftware.cron4j.Task

    • Uses of Task in it.sauronsoftware.cron4j

      Subclasses of Task in it.sauronsoftware.cron4j 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProcessTask
      A built-in Task implementation which can be used to run an external process.
      Methods in it.sauronsoftware.cron4j that return Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task TaskExecutor.getTask()
      Returns the representation of the executed task.
      Task TaskTable.getTask(int index)
      Returns the task at the specified position.
      Task Scheduler.getTask(String id)
      This method retrieves a previously scheduled task.
      Methods in it.sauronsoftware.cron4j with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TaskTable.add(SchedulingPattern pattern, Task task)
      Adds a task and an associated scheduling pattern to the table.
      TaskExecutor Scheduler.launch(Task task)
      Executes immediately a task, without scheduling it.
      String Scheduler.schedule(SchedulingPattern schedulingPattern, Task task)
      This method schedules a task execution.
      String Scheduler.schedule(String schedulingPattern, Task task)
      This method schedules a task execution.
